WeaponTraitDef.label: Vertical grip
WeaponTraitDef.description: This vertical foregrip provides an additional point of contact, giving the user greater control over the weapon. This enhanced stability is particularly effective for improving aiming precision during close-quarters combat.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Bipod
WeaponTraitDef.description: The two tripods sacrifice the speed of steering and aiming to enhance the stability of the weapon. This enables the shooter to conduct precise long-range shooting and increase the effective range.

WeaponTraitDef.label: laser sight
WeaponTraitDef.description: This module projects a visible laser dot directly onto the target. This allows for rapid, intuitive point-and-shoot aiming, which significantly speeds up target acquisition and increases precision in close to medium-range engagements.

WeaponTraitDef.label: grenade launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This underbarrel attachment allows the weapon to fire a single high-explosive fragmentation grenade, providing a powerful area-of-effect option. It must be reloaded after each use.

WeaponTraitDef.label: smoke launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This underbarrel launcher fires shells that release a dense cloud of smoke upon impact. It's perfect for obscuring sightlines and creating cover. It holds two shells and must be reloaded after they are used.

WeaponTraitDef.label: EMP cannon
WeaponTraitDef.description: This underbarrel launcher fires specialized EMP shells. Upon impact, they release a powerful electromagnetic pulse capable of stunning mechanoids and disabling electronics. It can be fired twice before requiring a reload.

WeaponTraitDef.label: incendiary launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This underbarrel attachment fires a single incendiary shell. Upon impact, it bursts and splashes a wide area with burning chemfuel, creating a field of fire. It must be reloaded after each shot.
